meanings.definition: A person or company that manufactures cars.
meanings.sent1: The carmakers in Detroit produce many vehicles each year.
meanings.sent2: The carmakers are working hard to improve fuel efficiency in their cars.
meanings.sent3: The carmakers decided to have a race to see who could build the fastest car.
meanings.sent4: The carmakers are the architects of the modern transportation landscape.
meanings.sent5: The carmakers play a crucial role in shaping the automotive industry.

meanings.sent1: The carmakers requires precision and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: The carmakers involves assembling various components to create a vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The carmakers decided to have a contest to see who could build the most creative car.
meanings.sent4: The carmakers is like putting together a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The carmakers is a fascinating process that combines art and engineering.
